subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrice Bergeron, one of the N.H.L.’s best two-way forwards, signed an eight-year, $52 million extension that starts once his three-year, $15 million deal expires, after next season.
snippet: Patrice Bergeron, one of the N.H.L.’s best two-way forwards, signed an eight-year, $52 million extension that starts once his three-year, $15 million deal expires, after next season.
